contactId.title: contactId
contactId.description: The contactId of the current user. This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id. If no contactId is set, ask the user to create a new account or to login with an existing account.

storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId to use for the current order. This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id.
